ServerTileMapFormatDesc::tileSettings_t Struct Reference

Struct containing the settings for the tile sizes for each layer. More...

Public Attributes

  • int m_meters
    How many meter the most detailed tile is.
  • int m_pixels
    How many pixels the default client has.
  • int m_dpi
    The DPI of the default client.
  • float64 m_zoomFactor
    The zoom factor between the different detaillevels.
  • float64 m_exchangeTileFactor
    When to exchange from a less detailed tile to the next tile: scalelevel( i ) + exchangeFactor* ( scalelevel( i + 1) - scalelevel( i ) ) I.e: 1.0 means change to the new tile when the scalelevel is the same as the scalelevel for the next tile.
  • int m_detailLevels
    The total number of tile detail levels.

Detailed Description

Struct containing the settings for the tile sizes for each layer.

float64 ServerTileMapFormatDesc::tileSettings_t::m_exchangeTileFactor
 

When to exchange from a less detailed tile to the next tile: scalelevel( i ) + exchangeFactor* ( scalelevel( i + 1) - scalelevel( i ) ) I.e: 1.0 means change to the new tile when the scalelevel is the same as the scalelevel for the next tile.

0.5 means change halways between the less detailed tile and the next tile.
